title: Virtual Families [Download]
features: Game Day/Night Cycles Tuned To Wherever YOU Are.
description: Virtual Families is a casual family sim that runs in real time! Adopt and nurture needy people on your computer and help them meet mates, and start families! Help shape the personalities of the people you adopt through praising and scolding, and then pass on the house to the next generation. From the developer of the smash-hit Virtual Villagers series comes the new casual game that captures the drama of life... Virtual Families!
